TopicTitle: Merge buton in VAB and SPH doesn´t work

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

after Steam updated my KSP install to 1.10, the Merge button in the VAB and SPH stopped working. When there´s a ship loaded and I go to the open button, the merge button appears, when I click on it the button changes its appearance but it has no action, the second ship it´s not loaded.

 

Do you know if there's any new option that should be enabled for the merge to work? Or is it just a bug in the game?

 

Best,

Juanma
I've found this too, it's a bug and a pretty noticeable one at that. Hopefully it will be fixed in 1.10.1, coming SoonTM

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/25666

Hope for a fix soon
thanks for the info, guys! let's hope
My workaround is to enable stock craft , I hate the cluttering so I always disable that, renabling it in my current save fixed the issue for all my craft
I have stock craft enabled and still my merge button doesnt work.
